      • getInstance

        public static APIHandler getInstance()

        Returns:

      • setKey

        public void setKey(java.lang.String key)
        Sets the Electricity API access key
        Parameters:
        key - the key, encoded in Base64, to use

      • readSingle

        public java.lang.String readSingle(java.lang.String lookingFor,
                                   java.lang.String vinNumber,
                                   java.lang.String sensor,
                                   int readTime)
        Reads the API if there is no local data present, then returns a single String according to parameters, Saves this as a kind of buffer for further uses.
        Parameters:
        lookingFor - resource wanted
        vinNumber - VIN-number to read from
        sensor - sensor to read
        readTime - how long to listen
        Returns:
        null or String containing the value wanted

      • clearLastRead

        public void clearLastRead()
        Clears the read buffer

      • readElectricity

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> readElectricity(java.lang.String vinNumber,
                                                                                  java.lang.String sensor,
                                                                                  int readTime)
        Reads data from parameter specified sensor
        Parameters:
        vinNumber - VIN-number to read from
        sensor - sensor to read
        readTime - how long to listen
        Returns:
        list containing either all data read, or the http response code if no data read

      • getMessages

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMessages(JsonReader reader)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Basic Json parsing
        Parameters:
        reader - JsonReader to parse
        Returns:
        list of string where each string is "key:value"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readIcomera

        public java.lang.String readIcomera(MainActivity main)
        Reads the Icomera API and returns a string with the SystemID if parameter is null Otherwise calls MainActivity.fromIcomera() with runOnUIThread and returns null
        Returns:
        string containing SystemID or null if parameter set
